attributes.action: Consider arresting David Cameron for war-crimes & arms-dealing, AND depose him !
attributes.additional_details: All the information & references for these denunciations can be found on: https://www.facebook.com/Another-Angry-Voice-185180654855189/
attributes.background: David Cameron & his cabinet cronies have damaged this country more than any other government in history, made thousands homeless, u-turned on almost every promise they have ever made, are destroying the NHS, devastated the entire welfare system causing countless suicides, evictions & neglect, ETC...

rejection.details:
Trials for war crimes are the responsibility of the International Criminal Court (ICC). You can find out more about the ICC here:

https://www.icc-cpi.int/en_menus/icc/Pages/default.aspx
